fireClass.name: Fire
fireClass.description: Fire Class - Become one with the fire. More damage, less health

magmaBeam.name: Magma Beam
magmaBeam.description: Unleash a beam so powerful it can wipe out a full-health enemy in seconds.

effects.title: Interruptible
effects.text: If you take an enemy hit, Acolyte Beam will be interrupted.

firestroke.description: Summon a fireball that splits into more fireballs

iceshatter.name: Iceshatter
iceshatter.description: Shoot a splatter of frost in a wide arc. Pushes away objects and freezes enemies.

iceShard.name: ice Shard
iceShard.description: Quick cooldown and packs a punch. Good old trusty fireball.

frostMines.name: Frost Shots
frostMines.description: Mark out your territory with some Energy Mines. If you walk away from the mines, they expire. Energy mines only do damage after 0.1 seconds.

frostAura.name: Frost Aura
frostAura.description: As long as your Horcrux is alive, you cannot die. The Horcrux will lifesteal from any nearby enemies, but will not kill them. Your Horcrux is fragile, so shoot it close to your enemy, but don't let it touch them or it will break!

lifeClass.name: Life
lifeClass.description: Life Class - Passive Regen of HP

growth.description: Release a melee-range explosion that will send your enemies flying. Be careful - this spell is so powerful it costs you some health too.

lifePellets.name: life Pellets
lifePellets.description: Shoot to gain 3 HP - Shoot 5 pellets that damage the enemy

effects.title: Cleanse
effects.text: Clears all positive and negative effects.

effects.title: Void recharge
effects.text: Cools down 2x faster when in the void.

lifeSlug.name: Life Slug
lifeSlug.description: Follows the enemy. High damage, but only if the enemy doesn't know how to dodge.

rockThrow.name: rock Throw
rockThrow.description: Quick cooldown and packs a punch. Good old trusty fireball.

liftWall.name: Makeshift Wall
liftWall.description: Pull up a wall from the ground

rockPelt.name: Rock Pelt
rockPelt.description: Quick cooldown and packs a punch. Good old trusty fireball.
